attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The community has an whole feels that the goverment the courts have lost control when it comes to the problem of youth knife crime. the suggestion i am making is that there is a mandatory 4 yr sentence to anyone carrying any type of knife except in cases where they are employed to do a job during working hours but even then must be carried in a lock box. so anyone caught carrying 0 tolerance no excuses no long legal process prison for 4 years

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
